Welcome to my website! I am a health machine learning researcher and biomedical data scientist based in Seattle, WA.

My general research skills and interests include:

-   translational bioinformatics and personalized medicine

-   big data analysis and visualization

-   deep learning and generative AI

-   natural language processing

-   network science

-   human-centered design

I am always open to speaking, teaching, collaboration, consulting, and outreach opportunities. Feel free to reach out to me with questions or requests at [vivek.sriram\@gmail.com](mailto:vivek.sriram@gmail.com).
